thread.section_title: Witnesses: Cab Strikes 2 Men Downtown – CBS Pittsburgh
thread.title: Witnesses: Cab Strikes 2 Men Downtown

author: hlang84
title: Witnesses: Cab Strikes 2 Men Downtown
text:
PITTSBURGH (KDKA) — Police and emergency responders have been called to the scene of an accident this evening in Downtown Pittsburgh.
According to witnesses at the scene, a cab reportedly struck two men and one of the victims may have suffered fatal injuries.
The accident happened around 8:30 p.m. on Liberty Avenue near 6th Street.
MORE BREAKING…
BREAKING..
Eyewitness says 1 person killed after he was struck by Vets cab downtown on Liberty Ave pic.twitter.com/qZlaNYnmge 
— Ralph Iannotti (@IannottiRalph) March 18, 2017 
Police remain on the scene investigating. It appears they have cordoned off the area.
Stay with KDKA for the latest on this developing story.
